effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.sun-moon: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
